CHANGES
*******

0.3.1 (2010-08-05)
==================

- Improved directory and extension ignoring code to be general.  Also
  ignore .tmp files, and .bzr and .git subdirectories.

- Actually fix ignoring of .svn directories; this wasn't working
  correctly yet.

0.3 (2010-08-05)
================

- Serf now ignores Subversion .svn files and vim .swp files when creating
  hashes for libraries.

0.2 (2010-07-28)
================

- Improved reporting on startup.


0.1 (2010-07-27)
================

- Initial public release.
